phrases: Things get bad when I am far from the saucer.
You said you would be okay.
Tell me, what should I do?
Take me where I can see the saucer.
Should we go back to town?
Dad, you came by car today, right?
Do not worry, he is coming.
Maybe they are not at school.
If only I would paid more attention...
I cannot see the saucer from afar.
How would you ever leave the town, then?
She is fine, I am sure of it.
But something did not seem right over the phone.
Are you sure we just need to bring her home?
You should call if you are worried.
I think Nonoka will call me when things settle down.
You were watching over me so my wish would come true, were not you?
So that we can always keep smiling.
It is because you were by my side
that I could have my precious wish again.
Have these with Noel-chan, if you would like.
I was so shocked when I heard that she collapsed.
Do not freak us out, shorty.
Nonoka, I am leaving you to take care of Noel.
Honestly, I would like to be there all night with her.
And I am sure Shione really wanted to come to the Hokubi Festival, too.
She probably got exhausted at the Hokubi Festival.
I am worried about Noel, too.
What is that supposed to mean?
Noel is the saucer that we called
She is trying to grant that wish from way back?
how are you both convinced that she is the saucer?
I made Noel help get rid of it.
Noel was happy that she was giving you help when you needed it.
I am sure that is what Noel would say.
Noel is the saucer, and she is our friend.
What do you mean, what is wrong?
Do not worry about us for now.
It is not your fault, Noel.
You were back to being friends again.
she said she is happy when she can smile with you.
Is it because I ate rice omelet?
Or because I jumped into the hot spring bath?
Because I passed on a message?
Because I will disappear if your wish comes true?
Do not hide anything about her from us, all right?
There is someone I want you to meet.
She is a precious friend, is not she?
I will take the telescope home.
I will be the one carrying it, do not worry.
Let me talk to you once more.
I do not want us to part like this.
Once our wish comes true, Noel...
Is it true you are moving?
I am just going to be living at my dad's.
I hope we can all smile forever.
I do not want to lose you anymore.
So let us think about what we can do.
There is no reason to think.
I am not as attached to the observatory as you.
I just went because you invited me.
I love all of you, too.
What am I supposed to do?
She is my friend, too, then.
I really want to grant your wish.
Is that because we called you to this town?
I realized after I watched you guys
that your wish is really, really beautiful.
That you can smile, and always be connected.
That your hearts would always be together.
That is such a beautiful thing.
So I want to see you all smiling.
We are closed for the day.
Go home if you are not doing anything.
I want to ask about Shione.
Something is wrong with her these days, I swear.
I wanted to talk to you.
Where were you all this time?
I wanted to talk to you.
I have to get the telescope.
what am I supposed to do?
I do not want Noel to disappear.
So get out of my life.
Does it have to be Togawa?
It is okay as long as the five of us are not together.
Then I could just be away from you guys.
I caused so much trouble about the saucer, so I
How could we leave it to you, Yuzuki, you idiot?
I heard your voices in the sky above the observatory that day.
Your voices calling for the saucer.
That is how I got to meet you.
as soon as I met you, Nonoka.
I spent time with you, and you taught me a beautiful song.
And the meals you made were so tasty.
are all so kind and warm.
I have to part with you now.
Next episode of Celestial Method : Night of the Meteor Shower.
